Getting Started 


Download file installation file at <a href='http://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/RDFOnTheGo.apk'>http://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/RDFOnTheGo.apk</a>

After installation, run application 'RDF on the go', the application will load data file at <a href='http://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/data.n3'>http://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/data.n3</a>, so it needs internet connection.

Following is the demo video of the prototype :

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ae-4ffiWaw0"/>

NOTE: in case If appplication doesn't work, try to create directory /data/local/rdfonthego by using command : adb shell mkdir /data/local/rdfonthego, then try again.
